basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, yellow flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, when sunny leave tip red

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes adequate light, placed in the scattered light in summer
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, keep soil moist, water thoroughly when soil is dry
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once 1-2 monthls in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
